Moved all Character Effects in their model classes; there were problems with playing the effects and the solutions were too complex to implement. Tests to be adapted

Removed actionPhase from CurrentTurnState and replaced it with GamePhase; moved the relative enum in the model.token package. Corrected all the affected methods, didn't fix the test. Created new method to cycle through the game phases, rewrote the commands in the GamePhase handler in the server package accordingly. Moved the character tests in the model test classes and created a utility class to help test the effects: the tests don't work as of now, need to investigate)
Fixed non working test in PlanningControllerTest due to recent changes
Fixed non working test in CurrentGameState due to recent changes. Now only the Character tests need attention
Doppia reference per tutti + fix ai test per farli funzionare
